name: SEAR Model of Online Game Addiction
description: An interactive web application simulating the SEAR model for online game addiction among students, based on the research paper 'Model SEIR Kecanduan Game Online pada Siswa di SMP Negeri 3 Makassar' by Syafruddin Side et al. (2020). Explore how different parameters affect the spread and recovery from game addiction.
inspirationSource: Syafruddin Side, Nurul Azizah Muzakir, Dian Pebriani, Syana Nurul Utari (2020)
